'''''The Camel, the Lion, and the Child''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to find all the Spenta Hearts during ''[[The Hymn of Tir Yazad (Part 2)]]''.

==Trivia==
The title of this achievement is a reference to ''{{w|Thus Spoke Zarathustra}}'' by {{w|Friedrich Nietzsche}}.
